column1: According to the dialing modality in use today for calling CPP NDC ranges of Argentina from
abroad (see above), which require including digit 9 after country code (54), we ask you
please to analyze the following implementation in your SMSCs.
In order to do not open our NDCs in your STPs twice (with and without digit 9 after
country code), perform +549 to +54 translation at your SMSCs.
The MSISDN range complies with the GSM 03.03 and the CCITT E.164 and has a fixed length of 12 digits.
